bigfoot.name: Bigfoot
bigfoot.description: A large, hairy ape-like creature, also know as 'Sasquatch', said to inhabit the forests of North America, specifically the Pacific Northwest.

chupacabra.name: Chupacabra
chupacabra.description: A dog-like creature in Latin-American and Texan folklore that is said to attack livestock and drain their blood.

mothman.name: Mothman
mothman.description: A large, winged creature reportedly seen in Point Pleasant, West Virginia, often associated with disaster.

wendigo.name: Wendigo
wendigo.description: A human and deer-like creature from Algonquian folklore that is said to possess human beings and cause them to become cannibalistic.

champ.name: Champ
champ.description: A aquatic cryptid said to inhabit Lake Champlain, often likened to the Loch Ness Monster.

dover-demon.name: Dover Demon
dover-demon.description: A alien-esque creature reported in Dover, Massachusetts, said to have a small body and large eyes.

jersey-devil.name: Jersey Devil
jersey-devil.description: A legendary creature said to inhabit the Pine Barrens of New Jersey, often described as a flying biped.

skinwalkers.name: Skinwalkers
skinwalkers.description: A type of witch in Navajo culture that can transform into different animals.

tennessee-wildman.name: Tennessee Wildman
tennessee-wildman.description: An ape-like creature similar to Bigfoot, said to roam the woods of Tennessee.

skunk-ape.name: Skunk Ape
skunk-ape.description: A cryptid said to inhabit the swamps of Florida, often described as a large, ape-like creature.
